item.title: 贝森特不担心市场，称修正是健康的
item.description: 前对冲基金经理、财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，在美国寻求重塑经济政策之际，他并不担心最近的经济衰退会使数万亿美元的资金从股票市场上消失。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, a former hedge fund manager, said he’s not worried about the recent downturn that’s wiped trillions of dollars from the equities market as the US seeks to reshape its economic policies.】

item.title: 土耳其算命师发现他们的未来包括税务审计
item.description: 土耳其国库和财政部正在利用人工智能追踪灵媒和算命先生赚取的钱财，这是打击非正规经济和增加税收的广泛举措的一部分。【原文：Turkey’s Treasury and Finance Ministry is using artificial intelligence to track down money earned by psychics and fortune tellers as part of a broader drive to combat the informal economy and boost tax revenue.】

item.title: 法国总统巴鲁排除将退休年龄降至 62 岁的可能性
item.description: 法国总理弗朗索瓦-巴伊鲁以养老金制度的财务状况为由，排除了将法国退休年龄恢复到 62 岁的可能性。【原文：French Prime Minister Francois Bayrou ruled out bringing the French retirement age back to 62, citing the financial situation of the pension system.】

item.title: 评估股市下一步走势的交易员对资金流动保持警惕
item.description: 上周的大跌使 S&P 500 指数陷入调整，其相对平静的走势引人注目。现在，当投资者在市场情绪指标和关键价格水平上寻找复苏或进一步下滑的蛛丝马迹时，他们还需要关注一个更模糊的方面：市场流动性。【原文：The selloff that took the S&P 500 Index into a correction last week was notable for its relative calm. Now, as investors scour metrics of market sentiment and key price levels for hints of either a recovery or a further slide, they also need to watch a more nebulous aspect: market liquidity.】

item.title: 市场动荡打破了新兴市场多年来垃圾债务表现优异的局面
item.description: 全球风险偏好的急剧下降正将新兴市场投资者推向质量更高的美元债券，这预示着发展中国家垃圾债券长达数年的涨势可能已经结束。【原文：A plunge in global risk appetite is pushing emerging-market investors into higher quality dollar bonds, signaling a years-long rally in junk debt from developing nations might be at an end.】

item.title: ProSieben 将向 General Atlantic 提供最多 10% 的股份
item.description: ProSiebenSat.1 Media SE 即将达成一项交易，通过可转换债券向 General Atlantic 提供这家德国媒体公司多达 10%的股份，以换取该收购公司在 NuCom Group 和 ParshipMeet Group 的少数股权。【原文：ProSiebenSat.1 Media SE is nearing a deal to give General Atlantic as much as 10% in the German media company through a convertible bond in exchange for the buyout firm’s minority shareholdings in NuCom Group and ParshipMeet Group.】

item.title: 美国加征关税在即，印度正与新西兰商谈贸易协议
item.description: 印度已开始与新西兰就自由贸易协定进行谈判，因为在全球贸易不确定性增加的情况下，两国寻求加强经济联系。【原文：India has started negotiations on a free trade deal with New Zealand as the countries seek to strengthen economic ties amid rising uncertainty in global trade.】

item.title: 苹果 iPhone 17 "Air "向更轻薄、无端口时代迈出了一步
item.description: 苹果公司即将推出的 iPhone 17 "Air "将预示着该公司向不带充电端口的超薄机型的转变。此外：苹果公司的人工智能危机将成为本周 "100 强 "场外会议的焦点，苹果公司正在计划对 iOS 和 macOS 进行史上最大规模的重新设计。另有消息称，谷歌准备收购一家眼镜眼球追踪初创公司。【原文：Apple’s upcoming iPhone 17 “Air” will foreshadow a move to slimmer models without charging ports. Also: The company’s AI crisis will be the talk of its “Top 100” offsite meeting this week, and it’s planning some of the biggest iOS and macOS redesigns in its history. In other news, Google is poised to buy an eye-tracking startup for glasses.】

item.title: 数月来最便宜的大型科技股未能吸引谨慎的买家
item.description: 在近期的市场大跌中，大型科技公司的估值已从高位回落。不过，许多交易员打赌，跌势很可能还会继续，而近期的历史为他们提供了佐证。【原文：In the recent market selloff, the valuations of big technology companies have fallen from the lofty heights. Many traders, though, are betting that the declines may well have further to go, and recent history offers evidence to back them up.】

item.title: 财长警告：飓风过后澳大利亚通胀可能加快
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）警告说，"阿尔弗雷德 "气旋摧毁了农作物和房屋，消费者的价格可能会上涨，他同时也揭示了这场灾难的经济代价。【原文：Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers warned that consumer prices could rise after Cyclone Alfred destroyed crops and homes, as he laid bare the economic cost of the disaster.】

item.title: 工党在削减福利辩论中誓言支持最弱势人群
item.description: 尽管削减福利开支的计划激起了执政党工党内部的不满，但英国政府仍表示将努力为该国最弱势群体提供支持。【原文：The UK government said it will seek to support the country’s most vulnerable even as plans to cut spending on welfare spur dissent within the ruling Labour Party.】

item.title: 中国制定提高收入和促进消费计划
item.description: 官方新华社周日援引国务院的声明报道称，中国将采取措施通过提高居民收入来恢复消费。【原文：China will take steps to revive consumption by boosting people’s incomes, the official Xinhua News Agency reported on Sunday, citing a statement from the State Council.】

item.title: 欧洲央行金多斯称不确定性高于科维德时期
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）告诉《星期日泰晤士报》，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政策给经济带来的不确定性超过了科维德时期。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s policies are causing more uncertainty for the economy than there was during Covid, European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos told the Sunday Times.】

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔（南非）寻求为钢厂提供现金救助，ST 表示
item.description: 据《星期日泰晤士报》报道，安赛乐米塔尔南非有限公司（ArcelorMittal South Africa Ltd.）正在寻求 31 亿兰特（1.7 亿美元）的救援计划，以避免该国重要钢铁厂的关闭。【原文：ArcelorMittal South Africa Ltd. is seeking a 3.1 billion-rand ($170 million) rescue package to stave off the closure of crucial steel mills in the country, Sunday Times reported.】

item.title: 美尼拉水务公司目标最早于今年首次公开募股 6.33 亿美元
item.description: Maynilad Water Services Inc.计划通过今年可能举行的首次公开募股融资 362 亿比索（6.33 亿美元）。【原文：Maynilad Water Services Inc. plans to raise 36.2 billion pesos ($633 million) from an initial public offering that may be held this year.】

item.title: 美国大风暴引发龙卷风和野火，造成至少 32 人死亡
item.description: 美国密苏里州皮埃蒙特（美联社）— 狂暴的龙卷风和大风摧毁了房屋，摧毁了学校，掀翻了半拖拉机拖车，一场造成至少 32 人死亡的特大风暴横扫美国中部和南部地区。【原文：PIEDMONT, Mo. (AP) — Violent tornadoes and high winds decimated homes, wiped out schools and toppled semitractor-trailers as a monster storm that killed at least 32 people ripped its way across the central and southern U.S.】

item.title: 奥拉电器公司因供应商会费问题面临两起破产诉讼
item.description: Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 的一个部门正面临其在印度的两家主要车辆登记服务提供商因未支付欠款而提出的破产申请，这给这家电动汽车制造商增添了越来越多的麻烦。【原文：A unit of Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. is facing insolvency petitions from two of its key vehicle registration service providers in India over unpaid dues, adding to the EV maker’s mounting troubles.】

item.title: 新宇航员抵达国际空间站，滞留的美国宇航员离返回更近了
item.description: 周日清晨，SpaceX 公司的 "龙 "太空舱与国际空间站成功对接，搭载了一名新的宇航员，这将使被困的宇航员布奇-威尔莫尔和苏尼-威廉姆斯最终返回家园。【原文：SpaceX’s Dragon capsule successfully docked with the International Space Station early Sunday morning, carrying a new crew that would allow marooned astronauts Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams to finally return home.】

item.title: 中国深圳进一步放宽贷款政策刺激住房销售
item.description: 中国南方城市深圳地方政府周日发表声明称，将进一步放宽住房公积金贷款政策。【原文：China’s local government in the southern city of Shenzhen will further relax policy on housing provident fund loans, according to a statement on Sunday.】

item.title: 百度发布人工智能推理模型，挑战 DeepSeek
item.description: 百度公司（Baidu Inc.【原文：Baidu Inc. released a new artificial intelligence model that articulates its reasoning, in an apparent bid to regain momentum against up-and-coming rivals like DeepSeek.】

item.title: 特朗普激怒美国之际，中国股民拥抱 "习特会
item.description: 习近平主席对经济扩张和科技创新的推动，令市场乐观地认为，中国股市将延续今年的上涨势头，并扩大对汹涌而来的美国股市的领先优势。【原文：President Xi Jinping’s push for economic expansion and tech innovation is feeding optimism that Chinese stocks will continue this year’s advance and widen their lead over churning US equities.】

item.title: 欧洲央行维勒鲁瓦称美国对加密货币的支持埋下了未来冲击的种子
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，美国通过支持加密货币和非银行金融，有可能引发下一次金融紧急状况。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said the US risks bringing about the next financial emergency through its support of cryptocurrencies and non-bank finance.】

item.title: 特朗普的贸易救市行动考验央行官员的神经
item.description: 在未来一周，各国央行可能会对唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易政策如何影响世界经济进行首次集体评估，从而出现一种焦虑的观望情绪。【原文：An anxious sense of wait-and-see may emerge from central banks in the coming week, in their first collective assessment of how President Donald Trump’s trade policies are impacting the world economy.】

item.title: 五张图表显示信贷自满情绪正在瓦解
item.description: 企业债务的光辉岁月正显示出褪色的迹象，贸易战抑制了对信贷的持续需求。【原文：Corporate debt’s halcyon days are showing signs of fading, with trade wars damping what had been a relentless demand for credit.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚与非洲开发银行合作建设 78 亿美元的非洲最大机场
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚航空集团和非洲开发银行将合作建设一个新机场，预计耗资 78 亿美元，将成为非洲最大的机场。【原文：Ethiopian Airlines Group and African Development Bank will partner to build a new airport that’s estimated to cost $7.8 billion and is set to be Africa’s largest.】

item.title: 法新社报道：Telegram 的杜罗夫已暂时离开法国
item.description: 法新社援引未透露身份的消息来源报道称，Telegram 消息应用程序首席执行官帕维尔-杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）已获准离开法国数周。【原文：Pavel Durov, chief executive officer of the Telegram messaging app, has been allowed to leave France for several weeks, Agence France-Press reported, citing sources who weren’t identified.】

item.title: 美国关税争端助推加拿大顶级交易所交易繁荣
item.description: 北美贸易战的早期炮火为加拿大最大的衍生品交易所运营商带来了福音。【原文：The early salvos in a North American trade war have been a boon to the operator of Canada’s largest derivatives exchange.】

item.title: 英国 PZ Cussons 公司解决尼日利亚贷款问题的计划被否决
item.description: 肥皂制造商 PZ Cussons 的尼日利亚业务股东拒绝了母公司将贷款转换成股票的提议。【原文：Shareholders in the Nigerian business of soap maker PZ Cussons have rejected a proposal by the parent to convert a loan into shares.】

item.title: 关税迫在眉睫，华尔街对 S&P 500 利润的看法正在变坏
item.description: 华尔街对美国公司利润引擎的信心正在减弱，严重受挫的美国股市可能面临更多动荡。【原文：Wall Street’s confidence in Corporate America’s profit engine is fraying, threatening more turbulence ahead for a badly bruised US stock market.】
